experience.description: Leading development of enterprise web applications, mentoring junior developers, architecting scalable microservices and AI-assisted user experiences (RAG, tool-use via MCP).

experience.description: Developed MVP and scaled product from 0 to 100k+ users. Built both frontend and backend systems from scratch.

experience.description: Created responsive websites and web applications for various clients. Specialized in modern JavaScript frameworks and user experience optimization.

education.description: Focused on software engineering, algorithms, and database systems. Active in programming competitions and open-source projects.
